content: **knitted wrist-warmers in drops lima and drops kid-silk the piece is worked from the wrist up in rib and stocking stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #icebloomwristwarmers drops design pattern li-205 yarn group b + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl circumference 15-16-17 cm length 25-26-27cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100 g colour 9032 fog and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25-25 g colour 07 light sky blue **needles** drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
